pageContext.claim: “The case fatality rate for Americans over 70 has declined by about 85 percent. That's a fantastic number. It's declined. That's case fatality. It's declined by 85 percent.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump appears to be referring to a number that is in dispute. "There is no consensus among researchers about how deadly COVID-19 is for different ages," {reported The Associated Press.} "The origin of the .04 percent statistic can be traced to a single scientific research paper that has not yet been peer-reviewed."
